content.p: Masters scholarships for students from Mexico FUNED (Fundación Mexicana para la Educación, la Tecnología y la Ciencia) offers scholarships and grants for high-achieving Mexican students to study postgraduate masters degree programmes. See the FUNED website for full guidance on funding and eligibility criteria. See our Mexico webpage for guidance on Nottingham's entry requirements for students from Mexico. See the FUNED website for full details of the scholarship application process and deadlines. Offered by El Fundación Mexicana para la Educación, la Tecnología y la Ciencia (FUNED)
